Developers using the ready4 framework can either use the same taxonomies we do in our models or else develop their own. We periodically release updated versions of our taxonomies. Currently available releases are described below.

```{r echo=F, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
make_ds_releases("10.7910/DVN/RIQTKK") %>%
      kableExtra::kbl() %>%
      kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped")
```
